infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Wednesday Waffle needs camera access to record your video updates.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Wednesday Waffle needs microphone access to record audio for your waffles.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Wednesday Waffle needs access to your photos to save your waffles and let you share photos from your library.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Wednesday Waffle needs permission to save recorded videos to your photo library.
